thread.title: Russian hacking bigger threat than terror says John McCain | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Russian hacking bigger threat than terror says John McCain | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris Spargo For Dailymail.Com
title: Russian hacking bigger threat than terror says John McCain | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad 'I view it more seriously than Orlando or San Bernardino': Russian hacking a bigger threat to the US than 'any single terror attack' says John McCain in interview calling on Senate to investigate Trump's ties to Putin Senator John McCain is criticizing President Donald Trump in a new interview, calling out his immigrant ban, views on torture, and recent speech at the CIA He also reveals his plans to do all in his power to have a probe launched into any possible ties between President Trump and the Russian government I view it more seriously than a physical attack. I view it more seriously than Orlando, or San Bernardino,' says McCain of Russia's hacking of the election Senator McCain says of the Russian president: 'Putin wonâ€™t stop until the cost of going forward is too high' He shares a story about his friend Boris Nemtsov, one of Russia's loudest critics of Putin who was shot dead when he returned to the country two years ago Senator McCain also says that when he received the infamous dossier on President Trump, he found the most salacious story somewhat believeable Published: 17:41 GMT, 20 February 2017 | Updated: 20:29 GMT, 20 February 2017 41 shares
